data.meta_site_name: Ambrose Funeral Home and Cremation Services, Inc.
data.text:
On April 12th, 2021, Lucy Rosella Cook passed away. Born on June 11th, 1949 to the late Helen and late Donald Citro, she was the devoted mother of Brenda Cooke, Donald Cooke and wife Shelley; cherished grandmother of Robert Bresnick, Jr., Billy Rose, Jr., Ashley Cooke, Donald Cooke, Jr., Jasmine Rose, Brady Cooke; loving great grandmother of Dominic Sharp, Rylan Rose, Riley Bresnick, Madison Cooke, Logan Rose, Haylee Bryant; dear sister of the late Donald Citro, Jr., Carrie Holtzapple, Frank Citro, Eddie Citro, Richard Citro, and Susan Citro.

Family and friends may call at the family owned Ambrose Funeral Home, 1328 Sulphur Spring Rd., Arbutus on Saturday, April 17th from 2 PM to 4 PM, where a service will begin at 4 PM.
